machines.name: ftp-server
machines.role: Corporate file server running vulnerable FTP service with hidden directories

machines.name: attacker-box
machines.role: Penetration testing workstation with network analysis tools

dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP service through port scanning
Anonymous FTP access leads to discovering hidden directories
Flag retrieval requires navigating FTP directory structure

scenario.title: Data Exfiltration Investigation
scenario.description: A corporate whistleblower has leaked sensitive documents through an FTP server. Intelligence suggests the leak contains proof of corporate misconduct, but the evidence is hidden in the server's directory structure. Your mission is to infiltrate the FTP server and locate the classified documents.
stages: Reconnaissance: Discover the FTP service through network scanning
Access: Exploit anonymous FTP login or weak credentials
Exploration: Navigate hidden directories and unusual file structures
Extraction: Locate and retrieve the flag containing evidence
